content: **whirl into the matrix** is a graphic triangle-shaped shawl knitted using one skein of scheepjes whirl choosing two- or three-colour gradient is strongly suggested whirl ombre skeins blueberry bambam or liquorice yamyam could be perfect two ends of the yarn are used at the same time measurements the longest top edge 175cm the height at the centre 75cm the gauge is not crucial the size can be changed easily adjusting it to the yarn you have or its amount we need 1 skein of scheepjes whirl 2 75 circular needle with 80 or 100 cm cable **10 07 2019 - the english version of pdf was corrected and changed** as in row 5 kfyob was mysteriously missing thank you damaszina 1 for noticing it 1 https //www ravelry com/people/damaszina
